title:
Improved asymptotics for moments of reciprocal sums for partitions into
  distinct parts
authors: Kathrin Bringmann, Byungchan Kim, Eunmi Kim
abstract:
In this paper we strongly improve asymptotics for $s_1(n)$ (respectively
$s_2(n)$) which sums reciprocals (respectively squares of reciprocals) of parts
throughout all the partitions of $n$ into distinct parts. The methods required
are much more involved than in the case of usual partitions since the
generating functions are not modular and also do not posses product expansions.
